kubectl_config.value:
apiVersion: v1
preferences: {}
kind: Config

clusters:
- cluster:
    server: https://DBC6D5C6E59004FFFC7CAB96B959633F.yl4.ap-south-1.eks.amazonaws.com
    certificate-authority-data: 
  name: eks_bmc-prod

contexts:
- context:
    cluster: eks_bmc-prod
    user: eks_bmc-prod
  name: eks_bmc-prod

current-context: eks_bmc-prod

users:
- name: eks_bmc-prod
  user:
    exec:
      apiVersion: client.authentication.k8s.io/v1alpha1

      args:
        - "token"
        - "-i"
        - "bmc-prod"

certificates.issuer: CN=Starfield Services Root Certificate Authority - G2,O=Starfield Technologies\, Inc.,L=Scottsdale,ST=Arizona,C=US

values.description: Allow worker nodes to communicate with RDS database

egress.description: Allow cluster egress access to the Internet.

values.description: Security group for all nodes in the cluster.

ingress.description: Allow node to communicate with each other.
